Name: Hidden Shapes Animals - VR
About the game: An immersive experience made for you to rescue your tranquility, be inspired, relax and have fun! With the help of VR, we've perfected the immersion and relaxation experience of the first game! Enter a world where stress will be left out! In an immersive and relaxing environment, forget about your worries by enchanting yourself and solving the puzzles and enjoy observing the power of life in nature! So that you can have fun and enjoy the game more, after solving the 20 puzzles, the complete art of each of them will be released, so at any time you can have fun again solving the entire puzzle. [/img] Surprise yourself with the minimalist style and the beautiful art of this game, immerse yourself in this world where stress will be left out!
